channel.title: pipeline on CDS - Continuous Delivery Service
channel.description: Recent content in pipeline on CDS - Continuous Delivery Service

item.title: delete
item.description: cdsctl pipeline delete Delete a CDS pipeline Synopsis Delete a CDS pipeline cdsctl pipeline delete [ PROJECT-KEY ] PIPELINE-NAME [flags] Options --force Force delete without confirmation and exit 0 if resource does not exist Options inherited from parent commands -c, --context string cdsctl context name -f, --file string set configuration file --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers. -n, --no-interactive Set to disable interaction with ctl --verbose Enable verbose output SEE ALSO cdsctl pipeline - Manage CDS pipeline

item.title: export
item.description: cdsctl pipeline export Export CDS pipeline Synopsis Export CDS pipeline cdsctl pipeline export [ PROJECT-KEY ] PIPELINE-NAME [flags] Options --format string yml or json (default "yml") Options inherited from parent commands -c, --context string cdsctl context name -f, --file string set configuration file --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers. -n, --no-interactive Set to disable interaction with ctl --verbose Enable verbose output SEE ALSO cdsctl pipeline - Manage CDS pipeline

item.title: import
item.description: cdsctl pipeline import Import CDS pipeline Synopsis PATH: Path or URL of pipeline to import cdsctl pipeline import [ PROJECT-KEY ] PATH [flags] Options --force Use force flag to update your pipeline Options inherited from parent commands -c, --context string cdsctl context name -f, --file string set configuration file --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers. -n, --no-interactive Set to disable interaction with ctl --verbose Enable verbose output SEE ALSO cdsctl pipeline - Manage CDS pipeline

item.title: list
item.description: cdsctl pipeline list List CDS pipelines Synopsis List CDS pipelines cdsctl pipeline list [ PROJECT-KEY ] [flags] Options --fields string Only display specified object fields. 'empty' will display all fields, 'all' will display all object fields, 'field1,field2' to select multiple fields --filter string Filter output based on conditions provided --format string Output format: table|json|yaml (default "table") -q, --quiet Only display object's key Options inherited from parent commands -c, --context string cdsctl context name -f, --file string set configuration file --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers.
